title: Still no patch...
body:
Twisted Treeline has had no champ specific patches in 3+ seasons. 
The meta hasn't changed at all

{{champion:113}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:141}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:10}} 

Riot needs to give 3v3 some love

replies.body:
I dont think Kayn and his 65% winrate (has it dropped yet?) has existed for 3+ seasons..

It really does need a balance pass, especially with ghost poro and maokai/kayn.

{{champion:57}}  has been top tier since before his rework.
{{champion:141}} is new and strong
{{champion:20}} rework has put him and {{champion:268}}  in top tier again.

Unfortunately, Riot's specifically said they have no intention in the foreseeable future to do any champ-specific map nerfs. Maybe they didn't want to spend the resources; maybe they thought it'd be confusing for cross-map players; maybe they just realized they still hadn't come up with a place to display map-specific changes after four years.

Anyway, they did say broader systemic changes were possible (e.g. gold, xp). However, there haven't been any of these changes either since the xp nerfs to Support meta. Moreover, Treeline hasn't been included in any Missions. The ranked season start Missions even explicitly excluded ranked TT.

3v3 love would be great, but it seems increasingly unlikely.
it just seems odd that they put so much effort into creating a game type with a cool boss monster, lore, and a unique play style and then not maintain it.

I'm a former Dominion player. Riot's [official reasoning for removing Dominion](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/retiring-dominion) was "We made this cool mode, but haven't been maintaining it. Now it'll take too many resources to start supporting it."

So while you say it's "odd," I say "I'm getting this weird sense of déjà vu."
As an avid Dominion player, I can tell you that the real concern should be about them murdering TT entirely sometime in the next couple years...
Why the fuck did anyone downvote this? TT gets too little attention already.
They won't, they're just gonna let it die like Dominion.
